package.description:
pr2_pbd_speech_recognition
1. Update msg/Command.msg with your list of commands 2. Run the script to generate the command corpus automatically: $ ./scripts/generate_corpus.py 3. Upload data/commands.corpus at http://www.speech.cs.cmu.edu/tools/lmtool.html and compile the knowledge base. 4. Download the generated Dictionary as data/commands.dic and the Language Model as data/commands.lm 5. Make
